comment: The binomial theorem for commutative rings (special case of ~ csrgbinom ): ` ( A + B ) ^ N ` is the sum from ` k = 0 ` to ` N ` of ` ( N _C k ) x. ( ( A ^ k ) x. ( B ^ ( N - k ) ) ` . (Contributed by AV, 24-Aug-2019.)
